events.name: Transition Minerals and Battery Supply Chains
events.wd_label: Transition Minerals and Battery Supply Chains
events.wd_description: Many challenges with battery supply chains are tied to extracting and processing of five minerals used in many of today’s leading electric vehicle (EV) batteries.
events.description: Many challenges with battery supply chains are tied to extracting and processing of five minerals used in many of today’s leading electric vehicle (EV) batteries.

events.name: Low Domestic Supply of EV Battery Minerals and Recycled Materials for Battery Manufacturing
events.wd_label: Low Domestic Supply of EV Battery Minerals and Recycled Materials for Battery Manufacturing
events.wd_description: Transition mineral reserves are highly concentrated outside of the United States; 50% of global lithium and cobalt reserves are in Chile and the Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC) respectively.
events.description: Transition mineral reserves are highly concentrated outside of the United States; 50% of global lithium and cobalt reserves are in Chile and the Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC) respectively.

events.name: Midstream Supply Chain Activities, like Mineral Refining and Battery Cell Manufacturing
events.wd_label: Midstream Supply Chain Activities, like Mineral Refining and Battery Cell Manufacturing
events.wd_description: These five battery minerals, a handful of other critical minerals, and a few rare earth elements and other non-critical minerals make up the “transition minerals” that we need for a zero-emission vehicle (ZEV) economy.
events.description: These five battery minerals, a handful of other critical minerals, and a few rare earth elements and other non-critical minerals make up the “transition minerals” that we need for a zero-emission vehicle (ZEV) economy.

events.name: Key Challenges in Electric Vehicle Battery Materials Supply Chains
events.wd_label: Key Challenges in Electric Vehicle Battery Materials Supply Chains
events.wd_description: Although it has a straightforward process and a reasonably mature technology, the main drawbacks are its high cost and high environmental pollution.
events.description: Although it has a straightforward process and a reasonably mature technology, the main drawbacks are its high cost and high environmental pollution.

events.name: Challenges in Electric Vehicle Battery Materials Supply Chains
events.wd_label: Challenges in Electric Vehicle Battery Materials Supply Chains
events.wd_description: Combinations of both pyrometallurgy and hydrometallurgy are also used due to their advantages in sorting starting materials for cells.
events.description: Combinations of both pyrometallurgy and hydrometallurgy are also used due to their advantages in sorting starting materials for cells.

events.name: Electric Vehicle Battery Materials Supply Chains
events.wd_label: Electric Vehicle Battery Materials Supply Chains
events.wd_description: The bioleaching technique uses bacteria to retrieve precious metals, but it is challenging because the bacteria need a substantial amount of time to grow and are easily susceptible to contamination.

events.name: Battery Chemistries
events.wd_description: Developing battery chemistries that provide the same energy storage with less mineral input.
events.description: Developing battery chemistries that provide the same energy storage with less mineral input.

events.name: Reusing Batteries
events.wd_description: Reusing old batteries to minimize the need for newly mined materials.
events.description: Reusing old batteries to minimize the need for newly mined materials.

events.name: Recycling Batteries
events.wd_description: Recycling old batteries to recover and reuse materials, contributing to a circular economy.

events.name: Mineral Reserves Concentration
events.wd_description: Transition mineral reserves are highly concentrated outside of the United States, affecting domestic supply.
events.description: Transition mineral reserves are highly concentrated outside of the United States, affecting domestic supply.

events.name: Lithium Reserves
events.wd_description: 50% of global lithium reserves are located in Chile, affecting the global supply chain.
events.description: 50% of global lithium reserves are located in Chile, affecting the global supply chain.

events.name: Cobalt Reserves
events.wd_description: 50% of global cobalt reserves are in the Democratic Republic of Congo, impacting the global supply chain.
